review: First of all, app shows estimated delivery time and if there's a delay the time only changes without notice of delay. Estimated time of delivery is frequently unrealistically short and not possible hence the delay is frequent. There's no option to see location of restaurants, and therefore there's no way of telling if the estimated delivery time is even possible or you will have to wait until your food finally arrive cold. There is no option of leaving reviews and comments for restaurants, only thumbs up (like) or dislikes, and therefore the restaurants also don't have any feedback about customers reviews. The only option is to file complaint to Glovo customers service, which we all know is not so good,and they will maybe relay to restaurants. Frequently happens that you can see restaurants, search and pick your food only to get message that order is not accepted from restaurant because they're closed. If they're closed remove them from selection in app please. To summarize, lots and lots of places to improve. Realistically i use it because there's no other choice since they bought and crushed local "Donesi" service that didn't hadhave any of the above mentioned issues, when they were late you even got an apology message, small thing but makes you feel they actually care for the customers, unlike Glovo.
title: The app have many flaws

review: I highly recommend this app. With me living almost 6000 miles away from my parents and family, when I found this app I was able to take them places they couldn‚Äôt afford. Actually they don‚Äôt go places, places come to them fast and with great food. I will not lie, out of almost 50 orders if not more, maybe a bit less( do not keep track) I had a couple of orders where I wasn‚Äôt satisfied by the quality of the food, but Glovo handled everything the right way. For that reason I stick with the 5 stars. The drivers are polite, they deliver everything in a timely manner, they surprise my family. And you have to see the happiness of them on their faces, priceless. I make them happy and for all these I thank you Glovo . And it‚Äôs not only food they offer so much more
title: I love Glovo

review: Charged and DID get any of the food. Then shut out of the account and my card is being used without my permission I'm in one country my husband is in another. I need to go grocery shopping for my husband & our household. I place my order as usual and it didn't go through. I thought it was because I use an American Express. I put another card in. It didn't go through. I thought it was because it was a Mastercard. I tried my final card which is a visa and it went through for one store (small items under $30). I proceeded to go grocery shopping at the next store and my card was blocked. My account was blocked and I was told that I need to send my identification as well as a copy of the card. I sent all of the information over and then got a letter indicating that I was no longer allowed to use the app. Not only did my husband not get the second batch of groceries. I am out of time and money it took for me to communicate with these folks. I believe there may be some type of fraud going on because why do you need anyone's personal information if you're not going to utilize it for your service??? I suggest reporting this app and anyone connected to it to the FBI crimes division because I'm sure they're using our information for something and it's not to buy groceries. Totally wrong for collect peoples personal information, if it's not going to be use for the service.
title: Fraud Alert! Buyer beware!

review:
1. A bug in the app didn't let me see the order I had just made, so I thought that order didn't go through. Because of that, I had to make the same order again. After some minutes, the first order I made finally showed in the app as "ongoing order", so now I had two ongoing orders with exactly the same product. Clearly that was Glovo's fault, so I thought they would apologize and just cancel the first order; no big deal.  
But then I contact them and they say they are going to charge me 0.90 USD as a cancellation fee, for something that was clearly their fault. I now think that the bug in the app was implemented on purpose, and Glovo is just trying new methods to overcharge their customers without their consent.
2. As others have mentioned, they ask for a picture of an official ID and one of your credit card. I hope they can reveal what technical measures they take to make sure they don't get hacked and those pictures don't get intercepted by third parties. I have used many American apps before and almost never have had to deal with that kind of requests.
3. On March 2019, they cancelled an order but still charged my credit card with the full amount. They haven't given me a full refund yet, one week after the incident.
title: Bug in the app made me pay extra fees

review: Even though I appreciate Glovo‚Äôs requirement of riders to submit receipts and its automatic recalculation of final cost, I‚Äôm tired of their customer service. I had many occasions, but I was fed up when the milk box packages I ordered from a supermarket came with 30+ cockroaches inside them. The problem with Glovo is that when products are wrong or low quality and you report, you are required to spend 30 minutes on live chat, dealing with a rude customer service representative, where you‚Äôre asked to provide details and photos, which they use to verify with producers while you‚Äôre told to wait online (if you close the chat, your request will be deleted). Then they have no solution and tell you to wait an additional few days or more until they decide if the products were so horrible or so wrong that you should be reimbursed. This is disrespectful of the customer‚Äôs time, beyond anything. I had a family of cockroaches come inside a Glovo box to my apartment, of which I sent photos, and they‚Äôre still taking a few days to evaluate if my problem is big enough for a refund. Deleting the app.
title: Bad Customer Service

review: I have deleted this app after may issues with Glovo.  Every order was late, and food often was cold and soggy. The final straw was the food being over half hour late, I watched from balcony the driver ring on our building buzzer and let him in. I waited and the food never arrived. The delivery driver got lost somehow inside our building (we are literally directly down the hall from the elevator, and despite always late, never had an issue with delivery driver getting lost). So, the delivery man cancels our order. Now things get worse, I contact Glovo customer service and tell the. I can see the driver outside my building, all they need to do is contact him to re-deliver - no way, they refuse and say it is not possible. Wait, it get worse. Glovo insists on charging me for the undelivered food. This despite literally over one hundred orders previously. After over an hour of arguing with 3 different customer service reps, they finally agree to refund my money, but tell me I will have to wait 6-8 weeks!!!! Never again Glovo, I hope all these one star ratings result in your bankruptcy.
title: Never again

review:
Seems like there is a break down between when orders are made, sent to restaurants and assigned to couriers. My app was showing my order eternally 20 minutes away. After 45 minutes I reach out to customer service to be told it was in the way. Another 15 minutes go by an nothing - 20 minutes no courier assigned. They tell me the same thing so I ask who is coming and when, next answer is that they‚Äôll call me, my app must not be up to date. I checked and it‚Äôs the latest version on the app store. So now they say that the restaurant was very busy and that was the reason for the delay. An hour and half later my food arrives. I asked the courier and he told me he was assigned the other 15 minutes prior and when he got the restaurant they told him the food had been sitting, ready and waiting for a while. So customer service is just lying to customers to cover up for a buggy app. I now had to reheat everything since it‚Äôs obviously cold. 

Until they fix this, use Uber Eats or Hugo or any other food delivery app available instead.
title: 1 hour and 30 minutes waiting for cold food and dishonest customer service

review: The app could have been very handy. Unfortunately it just doesn‚Äôt work: it gives wrong locations to the drivers. At every delivery they had to call me to ask for my address, and it turned out that Glovo had sent them 500 meters away. I tried to edit the saved addresses but the app doesn‚Äôt allow that. One can only add a new one, without the possibility to delete the previous ones so they just keep adding. Furthermore, when I order I get an alert that I am trying to order for an address that‚Äôs ‚Äúvery far‚Äù from mine, while it‚Äôs exactly my place. Customer support is nonexistent when the driver is lost and if he arrives 30 mins late with a cold pizza the app just offers a free delivery for the next order - no way to get a refund. If they don‚Äôt fix their app, Glovo just can‚Äôt compete with all the other similar ones available on the Appstore.
title: Missed opportunity

review: I was charged on my account for an order I never made (I first noticed an order was charged when I checked my bank account), tried to contact them to get it refunded or taken off, but they kept saying it was cancelled by me and just not understanding that I never made the order at all. The reply for the order addressed me by the absolute wrong name (which I‚Äôm assuming is the person who actually ordered it so I‚Äôm also assuming my account was hacked).  I keep getting the run around and being told to go to chat support (which doesn‚Äôt exist if you‚Äôre not ordering). In addition, the app glitches like crazy so I can‚Äôt review restaurants at the end either which I had also contacted them about (to which they also gave me 0 helpful responses to fix it). I‚Äôm over this app and their customer service. What use is answering quickly if you don‚Äôt resolve problems? They‚Äôre just out to take your money. Never using this app and service again unless they either become more helpful and fix their app and fix their security measures.
title: Charged for an Order I Never Made

review:
Don‚Äôt bother with this. I‚Äôm from the US and visiting Ukraine. I‚Äôd probably use this service every day, except my account was flagged at creation and said ‚Äúcontact customer support.‚Äù Well, there‚Äôs no way to do that! No phone number, email, nothing. I tried reaching out on Facebook only to be ignored. It‚Äôs been several days, my account remains locked, and I have yet to use the service.

UPDATE: emailing the given email address was ineffective. I was told they couldn‚Äôt verify my identity and credit card so I would need to send a picture of my credit card and passport ü§£ Are they serious?? I asked that my payment method just be switched to cash, so I could just pay in cash instead of using the credit card in question, but was told my account will still remain locked until I sent the requested documents. I went ahead and sent the passport with all numbers blocked out as well as the credit card, with all numbers blocked except the last 4. That‚Äôs all they should need to verify my identity. It‚Äôs been 3 days...no response!
title: No customer service

review:
The last few orders I‚Äôve made on this app has been a joke. In my first order from the Place, the food came without cutlery or the chicken I ordered. As if that wasn‚Äôt enough, the food tasted raw especially the vegetables. 
I send a request and I was refunded, so it felt like I could let it go, and I did. So tell me why in my very next order, my food was delivered looking like it was half eaten, and I still had missing items. 
When I tried to talk to the courier on what to do, he was more interested in returning to the office. According to him, I should give him a few HOURS to get the rest of my order. When I made a complaint, GLOVO automatically decided to refund me with money I can only spend on glove; as if I as in any hurry to do that. 
Even the customer service wasn‚Äôt any help she just annoyed me more. 
All I can say is that you people should put in the effort to provide the service you claim you do. And I want a refund, thank you
title: Poor service

review:
Yes it‚Äôs true the delivery times are usually off by about 100%, but that you can get used to.  But: about 9/10 deliveries I ever got were missing something, or a bunch of somethings ‚Äî from things I just wanted, to things I basically needed. 

They don‚Äôt just resend someone with the missing items. The process of asking for a refund (and when it‚Äôs just a couple dollars, is it worth wasting the time just in principle?) is bizarre and sloooww.

Orders are confirmed that are canceled an hour later ‚Äî when you expected something to come, they tell you the store is closed, or doesn‚Äôt actually accept Glovo, or doesn‚Äôt have what it said they had.  (Apparently it takes that long to find out a place effectively doesn‚Äôt exist.) If it‚Äôs closed, and it took you 15 minutes to add things to a cart in an app with pretty shaky UX, they don‚Äôt reorder when the place reopens. They can‚Äôt and won‚Äôt, dunno why.

Once they told me an order was canceled because there were too many items in the cart.  They didn‚Äôt split it into separate orders, they didn‚Äôt do a darn thing.  Somehow their very fixed limit doesn‚Äôt let you know (even before the order is confirmed): hey, this won‚Äôt work.

Use any other delivery app. Anything. Get a taxi and go shop even if you don‚Äôt know where ‚Äî it‚Äôll be less frustrating. It‚Äôs truly shocking how this service could still exist.
title: Just‚Ä¶ so so bad.

review: Worst app ever, customer services is inexistent I used as option for Uber today I ordered from a restaurant and they send me a different order however after try several times to get help through the app there wasn‚Äôt any response for the so I reached out the restaurant and told me that the suggest the driver to confirm the order due the comments in the allergies section. So the dude just decided by himself that the order was right and ‚Äúconfirmed‚Äù that with the restaurant. To make it worst after no response from Glovo. So the lady in the restaurant also suggest me that I can order and select ‚Äúanything‚Äù so they can take the order directly from the call and the driver just have to pick up... after 45m Glovo just cancelled the pick up... again I ask with the restaurant lady and told me that she don‚Äôt know why it was canceled. Until now there was no response from them. To be honest don‚Äôt waste your time with this app if you want to order food just use Uber.
title: Just Go for Uber don‚Äôt waste your time with this app.

review: It started by my rider canceling the order and the app took 45min without getting any new rider, I couldn‚Äôt cancel my order just like that because there was a rider fee, even thought I didn‚Äôt had one, through customer support I canceled and asked if I could go to the Glovo shops directly and they said yes, I went there had my order put again on the app by the guy in the shop, and another shop got the order‚Ä¶ the new rider had his phone off so I couldn‚Äôt speak with him and tell him about everything and that the address was 2 blocks away so I waited he called me at arrival told him what was going on, said ok but he had to tell support I said that‚Äôs fine and then the order was cancelled for wrong address even though I talked with the rider and they charged me the 11‚Ç¨ without giving me anything, waisting almost three hours in total. All they said was they were sorry I had a bad experience.
title: Bad service from start to finish

review: This is a company that saved my family and I during the lockdowns in Italy. It had a great reputation and now they have a different idea of what service is and it has become a sinking ship. Glovo goes out of its way to make you go to the delivery driver. TIPS get awarded to those that Insure Prompt Service and deliver to your door, not the lobby. The effort Glovo has put in to making you go down to the lobby to get your food is incredible. I do not know if this is a change in CEO mentality or a different owner but this application will be dead in no time with this mentality of service. They actually send you texts or call you automatically by bots to tell you to go get your order in the lobby. Keep it up and TIPS will never be givin thus eventually the delivery personnel will not work for Glovo anymore. Someone needs to purchase this company because it has potential, just the priorities need to be realigned with reality.
title: A Sinking Ship

review:
This will be my first bad review ever but I‚Äôm so mad at what Glovo did today. 
Made an order for over an hour and noticed the courier didn‚Äôt move for more than 30mins after it was updated he‚Äôs on the way. Called his number many times but didn‚Äôt get any response. I opened the chat help to complain about this and was asked to hold on while they confirm what the problem was. 5mins later mg order was cancelled and I was shocked cause at that time the supermarket already closed. Tried to chat with the rude customer care personnel again and boom..they lied! The courier lied I didn‚Äôt pick up but he never got here or called me cause my phone was with me all time. They kept on acting rude and asked me to pay 1,190 for an order that never got to me which was clearly not my fault. 

So many times before I‚Äôve placed orders and gotten the wrong items due to dumb couriers but never complained. Wish I could give zero rating. Deleting this app asap.
title: Wack Customer Service, Dumb Couriers

review:
In comparison to Wolt, these company has awful service and the app is horrible. Most orders i place do not work and have to retry several times and the app always crashes.

Living in Georgia, I am simply trying to add a ranch dressing sauce from a pizza store in Gldani called Ronni‚Äôs pizza. You can‚Äôt even create a menu item on the app with sauces or like soy sauce extras.

Their motto is ‚Äúorder anything you want‚Äù but their app is horrible. If there is any issue with the address section, like special characters, it crashes the app e.g. ‚Äú#7‚Äù. So many bugs on the app and they have never been fixed or addressed.

If you compare many restaurant menus in the same city from Wolt vs. Glovo, you can clearly see how Glovo is a very bad platform. They often don‚Äôt have pictures, and the app never loads them half of the time or better yet, I can‚Äôt even switch the language from Georgian to English anymore.

Glovo needs to setup automated integration testing and do more regression testing to fix a ton of software bugs. Secondly, they should compare their menu offering from restaurants because clearly, they offer a fraction of what other competitors offer. 

Check this:
Ronnie‚Äôs Pizza (ranch item)

The app is constrained by not allowing a customized order, so i basically never use this app and my app crashes after trying to check out from my home address constantly.
title: ‚ÄúAnything you want‚Äù

review: Glovo was recommended to us as a way to have birthday gifts delivered to our daughter for her 21st birthday while she is studying abroad in Barcelona. Two days before the big day we placed 5 separate orders for flowers, candy and - most importantly - champagne for a 21st birthday toast. We scheduled all for delivery on the night of her birthday. The other deliveries arrived on time. 5 minutes after all deliveries were to have been made, the champagne order was cancelled by Glovo. They sent an email telling me they needed to verify payment and to send them copies of my Passport and a partial copy of my credit card before they could process the order.  At this point it was too late to get the delivery made or find another service. No champagne toast. Customer service has been useless- they are telling me all of the orders are cancelled (even the delivered ones?) and just keep asking for my passport and credit card. Frustrating and disappointing.
title: The App is fine, the service needs work.

review:
I have had a very horrble experience with this app.. I can say that 50% of my order had my items missing l‚Ä¶

The last one that broke the camel‚Äôs back:
I ordered for a family meal from chicken republic one of its component was spaghetti. I also ordered extra sauce just incase. Guess what both sauces werent delivered.. How does one eat spag without the sauce?
Whats worse is that the customer care is so incompetent at solving issues.. They said it would be resolved in 30mins and they were trying to place the order again and till tomorrow nothing was said. i had to throw the food away..

 I categorically said i didnt want any bloody store credit. will store credit become sauce? 

Same app, I ordered for a meal,it wasnt available and they have refused to return my 1800. there should be a seemless refund system especially as you knew that what i ordered for wasnt availble;but these guys are requesting i send them my bank statement..(note this was another transaction)
I have requested that my account be deleted.. I also want them to know that till my 500naira is returned I shall continue to tag them with my negative reviews on all their social media.. pls continue to ignore.. imagine ripping people off 500naira from millions of people.

Your company and your workers are useless,incompetent and disgusting.
you are thieves!
title: Scammers!!!

review: After having to wait for glovo to deliver in my area i had a case where they took the full extend of the amount of the order just for cancelling the order after 2 seconds of placing it and stealing the whole amount of the order without stating that was the cancellation fee, it is imposible you charge me the full amount of preparation when the order was not prepare in 2 second with in the time i took me to cancel the order! Is impossible and is an abuse on there part to charge such of amount for canceling i Understand if I cancelled after 10 minutes in the order or if i have a couple $ of change fee but no way the whole amount of the order ! Is an abuse and is stealing with open hands is outrageous ! I do really dislike this app and services and more that don‚Äôt specify the amount of canceling fee and shield them selfs behind a foggy and no clear policy ! I hate this app and costumer service period!
title: Worst service ever

review: Was ordering food from two different location, so opened app choose correct location first than choose food and ordered, checked details and sew the location wasn‚Äôt correct so I texted customer support straight away and they said that order has to be canceled cos location is incorrect but they will charge me fully cos restaurant already started to make order , which is lie cos I texted them in a sec after my order!!! So they canceled my order, didn‚Äôt give money back! And customer support useless, it would be easily solved by calling to currier. Then I called currier by myself and he said he will bring but then after 20 minutes he called back and told he cant cos order is canceled!!!!
title: Terrible service

review: I placed an order for food, waited for more than 1 hour, then contacted Customer Support only to be told that the restaurant that I ordered from was closed. If a restaurant is closed, then the Glovo app should not allow clients to order from the restaurant and to wait so long. A ‚Ç¨2 rebate is not sufficient compensation for a frustrated customer.  The app should be improved so that customers are not allowed to order from a restaurant that is closed. Hopefully this feedback will be taken into consideration when the next version is issued. Respectfully, Tony
title: Needs improvement please

review: I‚Äôve been developing mobile applications for 8 years and I can say without a doubt this app is extremely buggy and not user friendly.   I‚Äôve lost hours of time in frustration trying to get around the weird issues that occur.  The final straw for me is that today I tried to make an order and after spending time filling out everything the app displayed an error saying ‚Äòwe found irregularities in your account, please contact us‚Äô. The method of contact is an email and they responded asking me for a photo id and credit card photo. I emailed them just a credit card photo explaining that for privacy reasons I won‚Äôt send a photo id but I received the same canned email in response asking for both.  I‚Äôve just emailed them a request to delete my account and all my information since the frustration isn‚Äôt worth it.
title: Do yourself a favor and use uber eats instead

review: IF orders arrive, it‚Äôs with at least 20% wrong or missing products. Frequently high value items are mysteriously missing. Additionally, they will say they are packing your ordered and that it is being picked up, only to be told more than an hour later the store wasn‚Äôt open. Of course if they didn‚Äôt misrepresent store and product availability you could have gotten the items yourself in the time they wasted with their apathetic lies and incompetence. Don‚Äôt worry though, they will give you a $2 voucher for the time they wasted, which doesn‚Äôt even cover the increased product and delivery cost you‚Äôll pay because they didn‚Äôt tell you until 11pm they lied about your order. And that‚Äôs not even the worst experience you‚Äôll get with Glovo. Wait until they deliver rotting vegetables. It‚Äôs awesome!
title: Theft of money and time

review:
DONT TRUST GLOVO WITH YOUR BANK CARD!!!
Glovo made two charges for the same order. They said the first was just a preauthorization, but it never came off the card. I‚Äôve also never seen a charge like the second one, so I think the courier debited it manually because he didn‚Äôt know how to do his job. Support was all low level and had to rly on screenshots of my bank account because they had no way to see what was actually charged. I repeatedly requested to speak to a manager and they ignored me and started sending form letters about how sometimes it looks like there are two charges, but they will come off eventually (they never did). Now I have to file paperwork with my bank to reverse the second charge. TERRIBLE SERVICE!!!!
Edit: don‚Äôt be fooled by their response below. I‚Äôve already been talking with their support for TWO WEEKS!!!!! Horrible support!
title: MADE MULTIPLE CHARGES FOR SAME ORDER, REFUSED TO REFUND

review:
Completely disappointed. I made two orders and my account was cancelled. I requested support and was told my account was cancelled because I violated their policies. I requested what policy I violated, and they were unwilling to provide this information stating that it was privileged information. I just wanted to know what I did wrong in making two food orders. I requested contact information so I could find out what happened. I was told that the information could not be provided because they have the right to choose their own customers. They requested a photo copy of my credit card and ID Card to verify me, which I provided. They still cancelled my account. I just need food. I feel betrayed, taken advantage of for my personal information, scammed by taking my credit card information and photo ID. 

I just want to know what policy I violated.
title: App Customer Service Failure

review:
The two stars are for the fact that they have the widest selection of restaurants, and for the fact that you get the delivery person‚Äôs phone number as soon as they are assigned. Also the prime membership for free delivery is a great model for frequent users.

Here‚Äôs what can be improved:

- There is no favorites list, so in case you don‚Äôt know exactly what you want, you‚Äôre in for a lot of scrolling

- The closing/order cut off time of the restaurants is not shown so often you get an annoying ‚Äòschedule for tomorrow‚Äô message only when you‚Äôve completed your order

- The restaurants are not obligated to upload pics of dishes (like in Wolt) and are allowed to post stock images, so often you‚Äôre ordering in the dark.

- There is no way to properly save your addresses. The app remembers your recent ones for a little while, but quickly forgets them and you have to retype everything 

- The restaurants go offline during work hours very often, while they remain online on other apps (Wolt)

- The minimum order limit seems to be always increasing, and rather than just charging you the difference, there is a big penalty or even two sometimes (small order + delivery)
title: Not good

review:
I used glovo 4 times one time only was correct 
Second time paid by credit card and I got an order of someone else when I talked to customer service they did nothing and I lost the amount paid by cc 
Another time I ordered from mandarine quidar and I got a message that the order is delivered while I received nothing and nothing also from customer service they just said we only guarantee orders from
McDonald‚Äôs , last time was tonight when I ordered from McDonald‚Äôs and I waited 1 hour and a half with no response I contacted customer service and they promised to have the order as soon as possible after another 15 minutes I got the contact of the glovo rep and I called him and here was the first chock that he said he is in McDonald‚Äôs and they don‚Äôt know anything about the order and he is trying to contact support and they don‚Äôt answer him as the order is not appearing in macdonalds while he can see it 
5 minutes and I found the order canceled by glovo 
Shame on this service and this is my last time in my life to use glovo again
title: Don‚Äôt order if you are in Egypt

review: Worst application and service so far, once i wanted to order the food but application didnt even work, i gave up trying. It came out that my order has been created and was delivering by the driver and i had no information about that. When driver arrived he told me that he could return the order and tell that you canceled it but then Glovo contacted and said that there was no way they were canceling it ( by that time i had ordered from the other application already) so i spend extra money for the food i didnt want. They couldnt even improve their own mistake and its embarassing. the second case was also application having problems with making orders so i contacted them through application but the employee was answering so slow that restaurant wasnt able to change the order anymore. I don't recommend Glovo to ANYONE
title: Service

review: I am really disappointed because I have been using GLOVO and recommended it for more than two or three months now. Had some technical problems of location but always have been resolved and everything was ok but today I was amazed because I asked for two GLOVO and always courier because I send things to my clients (always paid the same fee Q12 for the courier service) so I can add to my product that Q12 fee and the third GLOVO charged me Q23? More than double how come? So now they say it is not going to be a fee but is going to change. Very disappointing for me!
title: Dissatisfied

review: Glovo is a completely fraudulent app. Do not use this app at all!! Over the course of the last several weeks, Glovo would deliver orders that were entirely missing items or send completely different items. I began noticing that my credit card was continuously being charged with products that I never received. While a mistake can happen once in a while, the fact is that this happens recurrently with Glovo. After launching a complaint with their ‚Äúmachine-scripted‚Äù customer service agents, they told me that they could not process a refund in the system because the account does not allow them. What e-commerce app for not refund it‚Äôs customers if they are charged for products that were never delivered?? They are scam artists. Avoid at all costs!
title: Glovo is a fraudulent app!

review:
I‚Äôm trying to solve the problem of missing positions in my order for a long time (more than 3 weeks) I sent them multiple messages but received no respond 
 There is no customer service- only automated response system I was trying to google if other customers found the solution and I found lots of cases same as mine when goods were not delivered but the customer was charged the full amount of money and none of this issues were fixed 
 The problem is not only money but the fact that I cannot order from them anymore because I do not trust them I am afraid that such mistakes with delivery can repeat and I won‚Äôt get any response and compensation again 
 So, deleting the application
title: No support, no customer service

review: I ordered food at a restaurant and had a Glovo pick it up and bring it to my home. The delivery guy rings the bell and tells me he destroyed the order. Glovo returned the ‚Ç¨9,99 delivery but didn‚Äôt do anything about the order they destroyed! The right thing to have done would have been for the delivery guy to go straight back to the restaurant and bring me my original order, or return the 24‚Ç¨ they lost me. DO NOT USE THIS APP, other apps will respond for their mistakes and make it up to you. Not Glovo. Orden√© comida en un restaurante y contrat√© a Glovo para que traiga la comida. El repartidor toca el telefonillo y me dice que se le cay√≥ la comida. No me da ninguna soluci√≥n. Me contacta Glovo y me devuelve EL DELIVERY, pero no responde por mi comida. Lo normal es que vaya a hacer mi pedido de nuevo y pagarlo Glovo que es quien lo estrope√≥, o devolverme los 24‚Ç¨ que perd√≠ al usar Glovo. NO US√âIS ESTA APP! Otras s√≠ se hacen responsables.
title: Don‚Äôt use this, they are not responsible

review: In Ecuador.  At times, the app works well.  Most of the time however, you are left waiting for hours.  My order is often assigned to someone who is on the complete opposite side of my city. When I ask for something to be picked up from the supermarket, half the time it will say ‚Äòthe restaurant is preparing your order‚Äô for an hour, before it is finally assigned to a driver.  When the driver arrives at the grocery store, they still have to walk through and find all of my items, despite the fact that the ‚Äòrestaurant‚Äô spent over an hour preparing it.
title: Not worth the trouble

review: Worst food app experience I‚Äôve seen so far. I ordered food 1 hour and 30 minutes ago and on the app they were saying that the courier was on the way. After an hour I placed a complaints, I even chatted with the customer service guy and that he told he was going send me another courier. 10 minutes later still nothing changed ü§¶üèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE. Very disappointed, never using this wacky app in my life again and you best believe that I‚Äôll tell this thing to anyone ready to listen.
title: Never order when hungry

review:
When this app works, it‚Äôs pretty good. There are some frustrating decisions that make it really unreliable though.

Say you decide during the day you want to order dinner that night from a local burger place - so you check they‚Äôre open, and you confirm they‚Äôre on Glovo. Sounds good right?

Wrong. Restaurants will just vanish randomly from Glovo, without warning or explain action. One day they‚Äôre there, then hours later they‚Äôre not available. Then the next day, they‚Äôre back. It‚Äôs really frustrating and makes counting on this app impossible. Glovo has screwed up several of my dinner plans this way.
title: Works but is unreliable

review: I live in Georgia and due to lockdown use Glovo or Wolt on daily basis. Since you can pay with cash on Glovo I decided to make an order with it. I tried to pick from my favorite restaurants but there wasn‚Äôt any options. I tried to connect with customer service and sent them 2 emails. After 1 hour they shortly answered me back and said that it was because of the lack of couriers. I don‚Äôt really get it... Even their app description says that you can order anything you want and with Glovo and it will be delivered in minutes... What a lie. The only good thing shouts this app is that you can pay with cash if you don‚Äôt have money on your credit card. 2/5
title: The worst customer service ever

review: So basically I thought I was going to give five stars but what happened though is that I used it to order food 2 times, both times the order was accepted and as the app notifies me my order is going to be picked up I get a call and the order is cancelled. First time was the courrier and the 2nd time was from the call center of the company itself. In both times the excuse was the system is down in the restaurant. So I didn't buy it the 2nd time and called the restaurant and ordered the same order and it arrived just fine. So if you're gonna cancel I'd appreciate a liytle hobesty here, you can't just lie to your customers. However the app is more than fine interface is attractive and simple to use, responsive it works but without the service it's nothing. So one star for now.
title: Disappointed

review: Glovo shares your name and number with couriers, and I unfortunately had an experience where someone who did a delivery to my apartment used the information provided through the app to call me and partner later to claim they were ‚Äòin love with me‚Äô and ‚Äòwanted to have my babies‚Äô. When I mentioned I was married they replied ‚ÄòI thought you were a single woman living alone, which is why I called‚Äô. Wild stuff that would almost be funny if they didn‚Äôt maybe know where I lived. Glovo, you really need to protect users‚Äô privacy in the app so that personal identifiable information (names and phone numbers) aren‚Äôt shared out between couriers and people making orders. Ladies, if you ever fantasized about a whirlwind romance with a courier, this could be the app for you lol.
title: Women beware...

review:
The way Glovo treats its customers is shameful. On other platforms, if they screw up your order, you can expect a full refund or for the original order to be fulfilled.

Not so here. After indicating that the items were wrong/missing, in that what I received had nothing to do with what I ordered and I couldn‚Äôt even eat any of it, the only option offered to me was a paltry ‚Ç¨2 refund. I clicked on it, since I didn‚Äôt know how else to push the problem forward.

When I somehow got through to chat support later, they claimed that because I had accepted the refund, their policies prohibited any other form of rectifying the problem. Effectively, if you get suckered into clicking OK on the first problem resolution screen they show you, you‚Äôre screwed.
title: Horrible customer support

review:
So I usually don‚Äôt write reviews, but just wanted to write this coz I ordered something and paid online but the order got cancelled from
That place but my money got deducted and for a student it‚Äôs a huge deal even if it‚Äôs few bucks I mailed them and within few minutes. I got my money in my account. And the delivery is good and I get my food in proper condition every time, only one time I got my food not in a bad condition but my coke spilled but after that complain every time I get my food in the best condition. In love with this app coz the delivery is really cheap too‚ù§Ô∏è
title: Saviour

review: For every one order that is delivered satisfactory (on time, with correct items), I have 4 bad orders (missing items, wrong order altogether, or extremely late orders). Glovo app should improve its estimated delivery times. I would not order, if the delivery time correctly showed as 1 hour and 20 minutes (that‚Äôs how long it took to get my order when the estimated time was 30-40 mins). My order was picked up 40 minutes ago, my food will be delivered cold. Glovo gives a credit of 5 euros, but this has happened too many times and soon I‚Äôll stop ordering from them.
title: More dissatisfied orders than satisfied

review:
Cons:  
-  need ability to rate the food and leave the restaurant a verbal review so they get the feedback 
- ability to compare menus between multiple restaurants 
- ability to save an order without placing it (like a shopping cart, so that when you leave it you don‚Äôt lose what you put into the shopping cart).  Sometimes I like to pick foods I‚Äôd like to try in the future but not at that moment
- ability to have favorites 
- ability to see which restaurants are closest to me in a map view so I can pick food that is most likely to arrive still hot‚Ä¶. Sometimes I order not knowing the food came a distance away, and it doesn‚Äôt arrive well

Pros:
- I needed help with a late order, and I was able to quickly reach a Glovo agent who helped
- I like how it has my delivery details already saved
title: App needs improvement

review: No possibility of tracking through the town, they have some restaurants that have they own delivery, so if you receive a wrong product, as it happened to me, one can‚Äôt receive full refund but only the cost of the product. The customer supplied that works for Serbian market is not located in Serbia, but most likely in Croatia, so agent tries to write eastern variety of the language but as doesn‚Äôt know really masses all up and looks ridiculous. It would be better if they don‚Äôt pretend and make things so fake. And the worst thing you can‚Äôt delete your account and your details when you want to so so.  All in all: unprofessional, slow, and you can‚Äôt remove tour data! Disaster!!!!!!!!!!
title: Terrible

review:
I was very happy with the service provided by the Glovers and the fact that you can request anything from anywhere and it will be delivered to your door

But I am very disappointed to see the delivery fees increasing regularly, it started with 5 EGP and they kept adding 1EGP every now and then till reached 9EGP and I think they will keep increasing it, from my opinion this is not professional, they need to be more customer-centered when it comes to changing pricing
title: Got a bit disappointed recently

review: I started using this app as a coupon was offered. Used it. Delivery was fast. I‚Äôve had 2 deliveries so far. The fact that you see the location of the courier on the map is very helpful. The timeliness was great and according to what the app says. The app can be better if Glovo helps all businesses on adding pictures to their food. I personally only select the shops that offer pictures for their food and services. Overall, thank you for making life easier and help businesses grow and people get jobs. ‚ù§Ô∏è
title: Good and can be better

review:
Do not, DO NOT! Download this app, it‚Äôs inviting cause it‚Äôs cheaper than other options but at the end you end paying the price. 
I had an issue with the app, it didn‚Äôt save my location properly tried to change it but couldn‚Äôt. When the guy arrived y told him it was one block away, as I was speaking with him, my order got cancelled and customer service denied me a refund or credit. Even if they didn‚Äôt believe that I had an issue with the app I find absolutely unprofessional that they cancelled my order while I was speaking to the delivery guy on how to reach me and he was acknowledging. They told me those are the terms and conditions. So you don‚Äôt mind. Only there terms and ‚Äúdelivery can‚Äôt move one block‚Äù conditions.
title: They don‚Äôt care about you as customer.

review: I had an order canceled because the restaurant was closed. I was charged the full amount and still have not gotten my money back. At one point a rep told me to ‚Äútake it up with my bank‚Äù a very cheap attempt to pass the problem off to me. I do not recommend using this app. There are plenty of other apps out there with much better customer service. I would rate them negative if I could. This is an update.....I deleted the app but very stupidly I reinstalled it. I was immediately charged for an order from a month ago that they made no attempt to deliver but of course it‚Äôs my fault. At first I thought it was a charge for the order I most recently placed. DONT USE THIS APP. If you have any problem it will never be solved. Use ANYTHING else!
title: Terrible customer service

review:
During the process of getting a refund from a miss charge, the attendant was having me do rework repetitively asking same questions I had already answered and asking for pictures I‚Äôve already taken and given to her. After 90min of discussion over chat, while my food was getting cold (funny enough), I asked to talk to a supervisor and the attendant said she wouldn‚Äôt pass me to her supervisor. Then she claimed that he didn‚Äôt want to talk to me. Because of the length of the chat I said so let‚Äôs talk over the phone. She refused it as well saying they don‚Äôt have the service. Uber eats became to be my first option for delivery. 
At Glovo you can‚Äôt ask for leave notes or requests on dishes, etc.
title: Customer service is terrible

review: I loved this service for a long time, and I'm used it everyday, But now suddenly the app just breaks constantly. I have an iPhone 12 Pro Max, so the issue is not with my phone, but the app. Too often at random times the app will no longer include a food section, I delete it, re download, and it appears again, but only 1-2 restaurants appear. So I delete and redownload AGAIN, and this time the food section is completely gone and the only way I can order is by going into Tammy order history and reordering past orders. THIS HAS HAPPENED OVER 20 TIMES I SWEAR TO GOD please fix this because it's the only service that can deliver in an hour or less, and it's very handy, but my god, the app is absolute trash.
title: Terrible App

review: Glovo completely manipulates the reviews restaurants receive. I am a usual user of several Food Delivery app and Glovo is by far the worst. The partners they have can be described as the worst of the worst, the very bottom of the barrel. On top of that, Glovo will charge your card for Prime service even after you‚Äôve canceled it. Their system knows it‚Äôs been canceled because you then start receiving emails and in app message trying to get you back to subscribe to Prime, but they still charge you monthly for something you‚Äôve clearly cancelled. Their customer service is a complete joke and never ever will help you. Please, avoid Glovo. You will not benefit one bit from it. Worst company ever. You‚Äôve been warned.
title: Robbery. Do not use Glovo

review:
Having issues with the ‚Äúanything‚Äù order the courier suggested to cancel. He was not willing to search for it. Customer support said they will charge me upon cancellation, and I was ready to wait. In the end customer support promised to call back and suggest options but instead just canceled the order, charged me automatically and closed the chat without any notice. All further responses were ‚Äúwe will improve our service‚Äù ( well obviously they wont) .

So guys be very careful using that service and their ‚Äúanything‚Äù feature. Be sure you 100% sure the order will be available at a place of pickup. Glovo is not going to care about you or service. Just business
title: Very bad customer service. They are going to charge you anyway

review:
I have dealt with companies worldwide and never have I dealt with a more rude, incompetent customer service than glovo.
What they fail to realize is that their customers pay their salaries. Wake up and smell the dog **** you really need too
It is harsh enough that you get 40% of the restaurants check ! And a weekly fee but then you abuse their customers 
WHO NEEDS YOU! Customers need to get back to calling the restaurant direct and the restaurants should do what I did when I owned one
THE RESTAURANTS SHOULD TEAM UP WITH A FEW DRIVERS THAT COME FOR FOOD AND GET THEIR CELL NUMBERS SO THEY CAN CIRCUMVENT GLOVO AND HAVE THEIR ORDERS DELIVERED FROM THE DRIVER  GIVE THEM THE FEE OF 3.00 FOR THE DELIVERY OR EVEN 5.00   GUESS WHAT CHEAPER THAN 40% OF THE CHECK. AND THEY ALSO GET THE TIP FOR GOOD SERVICE. WIN WIN !  OH AND WIN BECAUSE GLOVO IS OUT!!!
title: Horrible customer service

review: Everything is really great and i love the variety of restaurants presented in the app (especially McDonald‚Äôs delivery option), however when i try to add my credit card as a paying option, it just shuts down on it‚Äôs own and wont let me write any information about my card on the designated page. If you could fix that bug i would be forever gratefulüôèüèºüôèüèºüôèüèºüôèüèº the only reason i‚Äôm not giving it a 5 star rating is because i can‚Äôt actually pay with my credit card otherwise everything is perfect‚ô•Ô∏è
title: Credit card issues

review:
I tried to order a Shawarma, when it comes down to ingredients, you get to choose, so it lists onions as ‚ÄúNo onions But next to it and ask you the quantity +1+2+3 and so on, somebody who speaks English should tell them that no onions means no onions doesn‚Äôt matter what the quantity so when you trying to make an adjustment you don‚Äôt know if you‚Äôre getting less onions or no onions, you just don‚Äôt know my Shawarma arrived with hot peppers, ketchup, and onions, and there‚Äôs no way to adjust to say no, and there‚Äôs no phone number to the restaurant, I already have a heartburn because I did not want ketchup, onions, and hot peppers in my food . 

app should be removed from the Apple Store
title: The worst app I have ever seen,treats  terribly

review: My courier claimed that I did not meet him for my order and cancelled it. I was outside my house waiting for twenty minutes. They charged me for it. Since he came close and waited nearby, they claim that he was present and waited for the amount of time needed. This man left eating my ice cream and charging me for it. I was never called or messaged, and the customer service chat on the app was useless and angering. My doorbell was never rung, no one entered my front yard, no one even passed through the street in front of my house. They did not even apologize or admit that I was right. I am quarantined in my house, why in the world would I not answer the door? Terrible. I will never order from them again.
title: Horrible service

review: As long as they deliver my food in time and to my door step I‚Äôm satisfied ... I wouldn‚Äôt recommend them for regular deliveries but I‚Äôm no judge because I‚Äôve only had one bad experience where they brought me expired milk ... I never contacted their customer support but I just decided I‚Äôm never going that road again with them ... Here in Kenitra they offer competitive prices and offer coupons every now and then (My favorite part) ... Would recommend but strictly for food delivery
title: The best App for food delivery in Morocco

review:
Maps that Glovo is using are often placing pin away from the real delivery location, leading to courier being unable to find the address. User is NOT allowed to move pin to the real location, which is rendering the service useless. 

Also, the service does not relay the order immediately, which leads to very long delays. Sometimes it relays order to the restaurant 30 minutes or longer after the order was placed.
title: Consistent location problems

review: It‚Äôs been some time now that I have problems with the app. It doesn‚Äôt let me order anything. I place the order and it tells me there was some kind of error. So I tried erasing the card that I had and putting the same card again to see if it would work, but it didn‚Äôt. Then I erased the app and re downloaded it and again, it didn‚Äôt work. So now my account haces no payment method and I can‚Äôt order anything. Please fix this because before this happened I used this app almost every week, I need it to work again pleaaase üò©
title: Having issues with the app

review: I have been using this app for the past 4 months (in Firenze) and though it usually takes a LONG time for the food to come, I am patient and wait. But today I ordered my food, explicitly stating an allergy I have and cannot eat and yet when my food came it still with the one item I specifically asked not to be added. I have been trying to get in contact with customer service so I can not only file a complaint but ask for my money back or my food to be remade, and yet no one has reached out to me after I submitted my information THREE times in the app, and there is no actual phone number listed anywhere! Glovo is wildly unprofessional and I will not be ordering from here anymore.
title: Terrible App!

review: I placed eight orders so far and all of them came very quickly and without any issues. One time the courier accidentally marked my order as delivered while still en-route, before I even had a chance to contact support Glovo called me to explain that everything is fine and my order would arrive shortly. That level of customer service is unheard of in Romania. I also like that I can see the driver moving on the map to get a better sense of arrival time. Awesome app!
title: Great in Romania!

review:
I have used Glovo about 5 times in Spain. The app itself works great. 
The delivery time for take out is usually a minimum of 1hour, even if it says it will take less on the app. I had a driver drive past my house 5 times before I had to run outside and wave him down, and several times the order was wrong or missing something. One time a driver canceled after I already waited 45 mins for the order. However, their customer service is really good. I emailed them to let them know about the issues and they were super quick to respond and gave me a refund.
title: Ok. Could be better.

review:
I ordered dinner at 8:30pm and a full one hour later at 9:30pm, I got a notification saying the store is closed. I spoke to the delivery guy and he was very rude and he said he is on the way and hung up on me. I tried to reach the company via chat and they were no help and kept saying the restaurant is closed. It is now 10pm, no restaurants left open and I haven‚Äôt had my dinner yet. I‚Äôm having bread and jam for dinner thanks a lot Grovo!!

I was told this was a good app but it‚Äôs the worst app and worst service I‚Äôve ever had from a food delivery service. I have deleted the app and will never use this app again and will tell all my friends to delete it. Never again!
title: Terrible service terrible customer service terrible all around

review:
I usually never write reviews, but this is just ridiculous. 

I placed an order and wanted to make an adjustment, of course, no option to call Support so I opened Chat.

They tell me I need to cancel my order, put a new one, and add any additional requests in the ‚Äúcomment section‚Äù. Ok, I do that and imagine that, there is no comment section! I chat them again (now a different person), they say it‚Äôs not the ‚Äúcomment section‚Äù it‚Äôs ‚Äúalergies section‚Äù, and yes, you guessed it, it doesn‚Äôt exist either.

So I just go ahead and place the order, and the good people from Glovo add the amount of the cancelled order to the new order, what a brilliant business tactic. 

Not that they or anyone cares, but never using this app again.
title: Worst customer service I have ever experienced

review: I use the app consistently and for a while now, but since about 2 weeks I couldn‚Äôt see the change from Georgian to English translation, for most of the restaurants and store, this is new, cause it was available before, I even tried downloading the app again but still cannot find it. Everything else is good apart from that, please fix this, as I cannot order what I don‚Äôt know or understand. Thanks
title: No English translation

review:
Did you know there is no central customer support? So if you‚Äôre in Ukraine or in another country, the reps there will only speak the local language. Any help that you need will go into ticket trash can. I‚Äôve tried reaching out to some kind of headquarters, but there is no such thing. Every Glovo operates independently from one another. 

American Express users, look somewhere else. On their app and site it says that AmEx is accepted, but it only shows up with an error message when it comes down to ordering.

I tried bringing this issue up with Glovo Ukraine, but they said no American cards could be accepted‚Äîwhich is total you-know-what-word. My Apple Card works fine (Goldman Sachs/U.S.) I don‚Äôt know what kind of customer service that is. The worst when they are flat-out lying.

They have no desire to help just close tickets when there‚Äôs a problem they too lazy to fix.
title: Caught lying, poor customer service, no AmEx, no other language rep

review:
Been seeing the app but never used it. I finally tried it today and I couldn‚Äôt believe how swift the delivery was. I used it online first then proceeded to download it immediately after to place my second order.
The app is very easy to navigate, the store I used followed my order intructions accurately and the order got here in no time.
Thanks for the free delivery too üëçüèΩ
title: Easy to Use and Fast delivery

review:
My mother from Florida went on a cruise which ended in Rome.  There, she found out she had Covid and was sent to a Covid-hospital.  With this app, I am able to send her anything she needs. The courier are excellent, they communicate with me (I live in Turkey) when there is a question or issue and the help desk was able to confirm a delivery for me when there was a language barrier.
Definitely a number one company.
title: This app is great!

review: I‚Äôve used this app for a long time for food delivery. Their courier training is minimal and their customer service is a joke. Basically, they never really help me when multiple times my order is delivered wrong, or never delivered. They don‚Äôt make any apologies or refund for intermediation and as a platform this is Alll the VALUE you can ever deliver. Also, how can you send me customer service response in Spanish when I am starving at midnight waiting for food?(zero customization for customers language preference).  I already deleted this app. Never would return - that‚Äôs why they can only do in small countries.
title: One of the worst courier training and customer service app I‚Äôve ever found

review:
So, my first time using Glovo was for something I needed from the grocery store (which is a block away from my house). After approximately 1 and a half hour, my request just got cancelled. 
The second time I used it, I had a problem with the payment method, it wouldn‚Äôt accept my credit card, which had all the credit limit available. 
Also, the app kept crashing in the middle of making the grocery list. Had to do it 4 times before I would let me finish it.

The reason I gave the app 2 stars, instead of 1, was because the lady who ran my errand was very polite.
title: Not using it again

review: I had to pay twice for one product I needed because I paid with mobile money and it didn‚Äôt check out even though it was paid for and has been subtracted from my account. There was no customer service or anything that can help with this problem. Nothing useful
title: No proper customer service

review: Food will come cold more often than not. Promocodes will randomly not apply, ALMOST ALWAYS. Client Support Service tells you different things: some operators will actually listen to you but will not be willing to help, some will not care and not reply, some will give misleading and wrong instructions on how to do stuff properly in the app (example: using a promocode) just like they have never even opened the app in the first place, while others will just not be capable of speaking in a grammatically acceptable english. This app is a litteral joke, whatever you do, buy the food yourself or use a legit similar service, they‚Äôre as unprofessional as they can get.
title: Honestly? KEEP AWAY.

review:
I have tried many delivery apps in my country and this is the WORST one so far: 
- first the app doesn‚Äôt often  work during lunch breaks and you become obliged to enter a long waiting list even before you make your order
- Second, some restaurants, even if they are listed on the menu, no longer work with them, so be prepared to cancel your order after waiting your time waiting for it
- Third, if you are lucky enough to receive your order, there may be completely different or delivered in bad conditions, simply because they don‚Äôt care about this and most drivers don‚Äôt even respect food storage and delivery requirements 

This app has been heavily marketed in Morocco and I am very saddened to discover how badly they treat their customers thinking that they have no other choices. But there are plenty of delivery app here that offer better delivery quality and customer services. 
Don‚Äôt just BURN your money on marketing, IMPROVE the actual service
title: Do NOT order if you are from Morocco

review: I forgot in the last review: even when they put multiple orders on 1 courier they don‚Äôt want you to know it so the courier on map shows like he is going towards you but in reality he is going somewhere else. This is literally tricking you and giving you the false information so even if it‚Äôs saying ‚Äú10 minutes‚Äù you can get your order in 1 hour. Even if couriers are using bicycles they still want to save more money so they bring you the cold food. I can‚Äôt describe how bad it is when you make 6-7 people eat cold food so you can save  a dollar or two. I hope they go broke.
title: Tricking people

review: The app is not designed well. A part of our order did not come (it can happen to anyone, it‚Äôs not a big deal) but, it is virtually impossible to reach the customer support in order to submit the complaint. The button to send was frozen and unresponsive for quite a while and there is no way to contact the support team outside the app or to talk to a human being to make the complaint. Really unbelievable that so many delivery personnel is employed and there‚Äôs so many users and yet the app/support is so unresponsive.
title: Unreachable customer support

review: The App is easy to use and the delivery fees are cheap. The only issue I‚Äôve had is loading my American credit card to the app. Also, if you are using cash, try to use exact change. Not all delivery drivers can make change from big bills (even when noted in the app that exact change isn‚Äôt possible).
title: Great if you have cash!

review: I‚Äôm so disgusted and disappointed by their service ..I have paid for my food and delivery and my food has still not been delivered to me ..I won‚Äôt recommend this app to anyone ..their customer service is bad and most importantly their couriers are worse ..They don‚Äôt take them through training..I regret ever downloading this app.I‚Äôm so angry and disgusted at the moment !!
title: Bad service !!

review: Today was the first time I‚Äôve used Glovo, and it said that I should get my order within 30-40 minutes, but today was a busy day, so it might be longer. One hour later, I get a message that the restaurant has started my order, and an hour after that, I get a message that my order has been cancelled, but they‚Äôve saved my information in case I want to try it another day. I don‚Äôt plan to try again in my life!!!  I was hungry, and it was bad enough I was going to have to wait 2 hours. But what if I didn‚Äôt have anything to eat at home? I‚Äôm not going to depend on these people again.
title: Order cancelled after 2 hours of waiting!

review: You send me an irrelevant notification every single day. Such an intrusive way of marketing. I downloaded this app to order something, and I will come back to it next time I need something ordered. No need to spam me with notifications, I know you exist. Might as well uninstall. But definitely blocking all notifications from this app.
title: Is this really necessary?

review:
For a service that depends significantly on ‚Äúthe right address or location‚Äù, Glovo fails miserably. If you set the location on the map, the app then decides it should ve somewhere else and moves it. If you type the address, Glovo decides it should be a different one and places it in another location. Here is a tip: maybe let the user decide what the true location is!

Months later: App is still changing the location of address and delivery people always get lost. Ridiculous.

To add insult to injury, I have spent weeks sending screen shots and detailed informational for debugging. Now theyhave simply   stopped replying.
title: Wrong address and location

review: If you are a foreigner or ‚Äúyabangi‚Äù living in Istanbul and don‚Äôt speak any Turkish, do yourself a favor and download this app. Reliable, fast deliveries, extremely polite couriers, fast costumer service - they all speak English Hallelujah!!!!! A total game changer when you don‚Äôt speak Turkish and want food or any other item delivered to your doorstep w/ 0 headache. If you are a foreigner in Istanbul you know exactly what I mean. Good job Glovo and thanks for existing in Istanbul.
title: Best delivery app in Istanbul

review:
When inputing international mobile phone (in my case from china) the sms wasn‚Äôt received ... i might suggest to include other option such as whatsapp, or email verification... in alternative to sms which might have issues on international numbers ...

Furthermore, The nickname selection is extremely hard... please make more flexible the nickname selection.
title: Missing option for international phones

review: My first order with Glovo went wrong in so many ways. Most of the restaurants could only be scheduled for delivery for tomorrow. After I finally found a restaurant the estimated wait time was 45 minutes. I waited an ONE hour AND 45 minutes!!! The food was obviously arrived cold and tasteless. Big minus was also the part where I was required to choose which sauce I want with my fries, even though I did not want any and I was not allowed to select a sauce (any kind) that I wanted with the meat. CS representative was nice, however everything else is terrible. Big thumbs down.
title: Long waiting time/essential tools missing

review: The app itself seems user friendly however when you actually try to order something it doesn‚Äôt say why it is not working. I tried to order 5 times and then figured that it didn‚Äôt work due to my card wasn‚Äôt it the payment methods. After that I tried to order again and nothing happened, every time my order just disappeared after all the procedures was done. Very disappointing app and also there is no way of contacting customer support through app or even website. I was able to order only through website finally.
title: No way of contacting customer support

review:
I spent over 2 hours yesterday trying to order food through glovo. Issues were as follows.

1. Not an option to use an American phone number. Nbd, I'm visiting people who live here, but if you don't have a local number and are from America you can't use the app.
2. Used my friend's number, but then it wouldn't accept my credit card. Tried logging into PayPal, it wouldn't accept that either.
3. Asked my friend to order for me. Glovo said the address of the hotel I was staying at doesn't exist, despite it clearly existing 0.5 miles away and it showing up for my other friend.
4. My other friend had entirely different restaurant options than I did. I found food from 3 different places, none of them showed up for her (despite us using the same exact address).

I was sick, hungry, and extremely frustrated after over 2 hours of trying to get glovo to work.
title: Unusable as an American or a local

review:
I placed an order and it wasn‚Äôt delivered on time, I moved to another place that unfortunately was out of delivery bounds (even if it was just one street away). 
The delivery guy refused to cross the street for me to get the order.
They cancelled my order, I already had payed with credit card. I wonder what would happen if I had chosen to pay with cash.
title: Cancelled order

review: Useless app, they have 1/5 customer relationship no manners, no respect they just cancel order and steal your money without refund.. stay away if you are from outside and planning on coming to Ghana for holidays Avoid this app is a crap‚Ä¶ they just sell nonsense I will give you all 0/5 rate poor app‚Ä¶
title: Thief‚Äôs they cancelled my order and didn‚Äôt refund my money back

review: I keep getting promotional spam notifications almost daily. Yes, I‚Äôve turned off promotoonal notifications in the app. But I still get so many promotional notifications from them that I‚Äôve had to turn off app notifications from Glovo altogether. It‚Äôs a good service and they don‚Äôt need to resort to such dark tactics. When they fix the issue, I‚Äôll start using the app again.
title: Notification spam

review:
I really enjoy the app as it always allow me to eat pretty quickly and even get some extra items like the courrier service.
However, it would be great to have some control over the previous command like categorizing them or even delete them.
I would be glad to see this update come thru.
title: Great app

review:
Very often Restaurants are missing some items. They call to substitute them with something else. 

Unfortunately it‚Äôs not possible to cancel partially unfulfilled order. So in the end you are forced to pay for something else or get your order reduced and pay additional delivery cost for smaller order. 

There is no hotline to contact. Restaurants deny to cancel the order and such order cancelled by customer have full order price penalty charge!!!!
title: Poor Customer Support. Problem resolution forced on Customer

review: They charged my account because they said the delivery driver tried to call me because my request was unavailable. That never happened I actually was the one that tried to call the driver. I even sent them a screenshot of my call log. So basically I paid them for making an order.
title: Do better

review: Do not order with Glovo, they never deliver on time! I been using their service for a month now and I am uninstalling the app right now. The food had to be delivered in 8 minutes and got delivered for 25 minutes which in a small city like Yerevan you can get to the farthest point in that time frame. Literally the worst service ever used.

review: I have used Glovo loyaly for a few years for delivery at home. And these last few orders have been the worst possible and customer service even worse. Orders take more than 2 hours to arrive but keep lying to you about the time, sometimes a glover is not assigned. The app keep taking forever to load and there is little way to know the real status of your order. It take speaking with more than 2 people in customer service to get any reaction. And one time they assignes us a glover who was halfway aceoss barcelona and no where near the pick up location. Muy descepcionda!!

review:
Title. Operating in an economic region that is  heavily reliant on the tourist industry, you would think the developers/management of this app would implement a translation function or the ability to copy and paste text so that other translation apps could be used. 

They did I include a button, but too bad it translates from native language to native language! 

Life is a box of chocolates, I guess!
title: No translation of menu items/descriptions to English. No text copying functionality.

review: Their map is terrible the can‚Äôt locate where you are and they charge you when the can‚Äôt locate you even when the can‚Äôt update their map, and their response is poor I‚Äôm done with the stupid app I can‚Äôt allow myself to be charged again when clearly the can‚Äôt update their map
title: The have the worst delivery in my country

review: The app usually works, but they appear to have near zero accountability for the merchants. I ordered sushi once and the tuna was black. And Glovo argued with me over the refund even after I provided photos. I mean black and I am not exaggerating. I would post a photo here if I could. That is just one problem. While the issues are rare Glovo doesn‚Äôt really resolve them. ‚ÄòOrder is an hour late, just cancel it‚Äô, etc. I am happy I am moving to a place where I do not have to rely on Glovo.

review: I was trying to buy kfc then I made an option of ether paying with cash or mobile money but I mistakenly set the payment method to mobile money then I went to that screen but I wanted to cancel I saw the cancel button just there I pressed several times but nothing happened I reset the app but when I went back still the same screen then I deleted the thing but when I downloaded it back still that same screen popped up so I can‚Äôt use Glock now at all
title: Why

review:
Firstly, you can‚Äôt add some credit cards to your account simply because their system is obviously buggy and won‚Äôt process them properly.

Secondly, not only were I asked to verify my identity more than once which is ridiculous by itself, since nothing has changed there! After those idiotic checks my account got blocked without any good reason, my repeated orders seemed suspicious to them (so much for customer support).

On top of all that, their support team has no idea what went wrong and how to fix it. Definitely the worst service I‚Äôve ever seen.
title: Customer service is freaking terrible

review:
Why would Glovo give a 15 minute by car delivery to a bicycle delivery? At this point I‚Äôm waiting an hour at the gate and our delivery reached within 2 minutes of us only to watch them stop and start driving away from us again. 1 hour + wait so far for what will end up being soggy cold burgers. I‚Äôm not even faulting the driver necessarily for being given an order that he should never have been given while on a pedal bike.

Also contacted customer service. Gave up after 15-20 mins of please hold.
title: Terrible delivery service

review:
I haven‚Äôt had a single order without an issue. It‚Äôs either missing half the items, charging a wrong amount, failure to arrive to the restaurant, and many other malfunctions for this ridiculous excuse of a service.
The most outrageous was a courrier calling me so many times to ask for the restaurant name, my location, the restaurant location, and my order. When I asked what‚Äôs the use of this app then if he‚Äôll keep calling me for every detail, he said that he doesn‚Äôt know English. He can‚Äôt read anything on the app in English, not the address, not the restaurant name, nothing!
title: Disappointment

review: The delivery driver was courteous and respectful. He was quick with the food and very careful with all of our packages. Thank you Mr. delivery driver. My hat comes off for you.  The food at the restaurants we patronized was absolutely 10 star hot fresh delicious. I couldn‚Äôt of eaten better if I was at the Ritz steakhouse thank you Ukrainian restaurants and pastries,  my compliments to the chef.
title: FANTASTIC SERVICE

review: Spent almost an hour putting together a list of things to buy from Glovo‚Äôs store only for at the very end to say ‚ÄúOops! Sorry this store is unavailable.‚Äù (Tried to submit this order at 10:15) ‚Äî Trying again led to failed payment.  Another poor design is that they say you can pay in cash, but that there‚Äôs a limit to how much the order can be.  Why not have an IQ over 80 and just say ‚Äúthere‚Äôs a 300 lei limit‚Äù or something.  I have no idea what the limit is nor does their app/website state it.  Absolutely pathetic.
title: Poorly designed

review: This app is a scam. I ordered from a local restaurant and we didn‚Äôt understand each other, so they never delivered my food. That isn‚Äôt the whole issue. They still charged me for the food that was never delivered and when I sent a request for a refund, they never acknowledged the message. My bank statement says Glovo and not the local restaurant, so I have to assume that they just scam their ‚Äúcustomers.‚Äù I was waiting for a response before deleting the app, but I don‚Äôt see that happening at this point. Never again. Don‚Äôt trust this app!!
title: Scam

review:
Drivers dropped off partial orders multiple times.  They did not tell me then drove away after I paid for all the items.  Upon opening my bags I found up to 40 percent of the items were missing.  They started out giving me credit.  This sounds great but I would have to pay for the delivery service again.   Basically I would have to pay for 2 deliveries to get what I ordered.  

There were a few drivers who called me to ask if I wanted other products.  They would lowered my total if the supermarket did not have my items, but that was only 1/4 of them.  

I think the biggest problem is the app had items that were out of stock.  I don‚Äôt know if the drivers were intentional ripping me off or if they just looked at the total on their phone but every single order of mine had issues.  

Buyers be warned.
title: Hot Mess

review: I decided I'll give a try to this service today and ordered a sandwich for lunch from a restaurant I know. For some reason the sandwich was wrapped very tight with a plastic bag that rendered it into a complete mush by the time it arrived. After complaining to customer service i realized i had been charged almost 20% more than what I accepted to pay when ordering the food. Customer service only offered me to credit my account with the extra charge for my next order while they should had refunded my credit card. Borderline illegal if you ask me, glovo never again.

review: I find it very often that orders are not complete. I‚Äôve had food arrive that was in a broken container, orders that were incomplete and delivery people minding their own business to show up an hour later with the order that was now wear and cold. The only positive side of Glovo is that it allows for you to get food when you don‚Äôt feel like going anywhere... like any other delivery service. Also the customer service is slow and there is no option for calling the service people.

review:
I made a total of 4 food delivery orders thus far. My 4th (and last) order was absolutely comical. I was overcharged on my order, even though the menu is priced and shows on the app, so there should be no differences of the price given upfront and the price charged at delivery. Glovo‚Äôs customer service is NON EXISTENT and when you do get a hold of them they mock you and send you automatic responses that don‚Äôt even have anything to do with your problem. In the end I WAS NOT GIVEN A REFUND and was ROBBED by this company! 

My advice, stick to Uber eats or any other food delivery app. This is not an honest company, nor do they care.

Well, joke‚Äôs on me. They charged me anyways. All of this in less than 5 minutes. I tried to call the restaurant, they ignored me. I called assistance, she said she couldn‚Äôt help me and blocked me from the chat window I had opened with her. 
I‚Äôm extremely angry with Glovo, never again.

review: I have ordered from Glovo many times and have mostly good experiences however there are MANY times where the app states that it will take 30-40 minutes and I wait well over 2 hours. review: Your payment platform is terrible and failure rate is very high. Plus you don‚Äôt accept Visa cards.  This is ridiculous. Why are you limiting your customers? There app is intentionally designed to make getting support difficult. The app has no way of alerting me to consent to the restaurant changing my order so they were able to do it with impunity.

review: My account was locked the very first time I tried to use the app.  They wanted ID and Credit info.  Sent that and got denied the unlock with no details on why. review: I‚Äôm trying to get a refund, answer ok, but it‚Äôs already 30 days passed and no refund! I checking my bank account everyday! They stole my money!
