review: 80% of orders are going smooth, but if you are in a bad situation, e.g. courier left your order at wrong place, or order is wrongly delivered, or in any other cases, when you really need apps Support to help you, they‚Äôre like: we can just give you Glovo credits, or decline order and we give you back 100% of order amount in Glovo credits. POOOOOREST Support in whole delivery business market. Just order and pray that you won‚Äôt need support‚Äôs help. They gonna just make you even madder.
title: ·Éû·É†·Éù·Éë·Éö·Éî·Éõ·Éî·Éë·Éò

review:
This is literally the worst app i ever used in my life they steal your money just because they can and they blame it on "oh we didnt take it it's blocked check with your bank "+ they charge you extra money too . 

 Their costumer service is also the worst they just send you scripts they already have , they never refund you for the canceled orders even the ones they canceled i'm deleting this stupid app and never using it again and i would rate it as a 0/5 and if i could rate them even lower i will .
title: The worst app ever

review:
Although this app appears to be well designed it is fundamentally flawed. 

Besides several visual glitches (that however do not really impact the user experience) the real issue is how the support section is designed: if you open a chat with an operator about a delivery or any other issue, the chat is open in overlay and, if it gets closed or the app crashes (and it often does crash), any active chat is lost unless the support agent writes one  additional response. Until that moment the chat is invisible to the user. 

This is a flawed mechanism that highly complicated support requests for the end user and provide deniability to the service provider about any issue ever reported by a user. 

It is a very unfair policy for the user.
title: The app is flawed

review: Shady stuff. The customer service and help function is deliberately disabled. They want to avoid any returns or complaints. They disconnected their only working phone number too. I‚Äôm not sure how they want to survive like this, but will never order here again.
title: Sneaky Business

review:
I live in the USA, we have no GLOVO service here, BUT I have registered in GLOVO, because wanted to send birthday gifts to my friends, who live in Europe. Until today never made a purchase yet.  Today I received an email, that someone used my card information in UKRAINE, ordered food from the restaurant. Thank god I saw an email on time and canceled it before they delivered, and also the representative told me to get my money back in 5-10 business days. I hope I‚Äôll get my money back.
AS SOON ILL GET MY MONEY BACK, IM DELETING THIS HORRIBLE, DISGUSTING APP. üò°ü§¨üò°ü§¨
title: Would give zero star if they had

The worst part is not being able to save a ‚Äúfavorites‚Äù list, you are forced to scroll down endlessly to find something to order. The favorites list should be a must for a product like this.

When I contacted Glovo they told me there was nothing they could do. What a scam of a company! Don‚Äôt trust Glovo!!! A complete rip off that you have to pay extra for and if the delivery driver decides to keep your food or not deliver to you, Glovo won‚Äôt support the customer! review:

review: So I ordered a meal and first it doesn‚Äôt show a time estimate until 30-35 minutes later. Then it doesn‚Äôt move from ‚Äúit will arrive in 30min‚Äù. review:
I am always a very happy customer with Glovo - from the outlets to the delivery fulfilment, provided I am paying via mobile money.

I recently linked my debit card because I needed to use the courier service and discovered that only card payment is enabled for that.

I left my card linked, figuring that the choice of when to pay by card or mobile money would be convenient. Then I realised that card payments attract unexplained additional charges that don‚Äôt add up. 

So, buyer beware.

review: This app is one of the few delivery apps that works in Venice, Italy, so I was excited to discover it. After trying with many emails I was finally told the delivery guy filed my order as "cancelled" (even though I received it and paid for it) therefore I had to paid for it and they gave my inquiry a "closed" status.
The people in this company and are straight up thieves.
title: They robbed me.

review:
I never leave reviews for apps but this app is perfect !!!
Everything is spot on, the descriptions , some deliveries are free and the ones that aren‚Äôt are not up to 500 Naira, delivery time is accurate and met. 
The food and price description is clear and well communicated and the map is perfect.

review: Their ratings are a scam. The food I received was spoiled and when I later tried to rate the restaurant I had no option to do so. This was my most recent order too. Wish I had a way to attach screenshots of my conversation with their customer support team, which advised me to talk to the restaurant directly and let them know about my experience. Really??!!

review:
The only reason i am submitting this review is to point out the hypocrisy of the app, when Ukraine was under attack the app didn‚Äôt wait to plaster the stand with ukraine sign, now that Palestine is getting murdered in front of everyone, live on the internet, the app just decided that they are not worth advocating for. 
The is also the fact that the app doesn‚Äôt have most of the supermarkets i need to shop at, but that‚Äôs is not the  problem i am here to report. Be humane, don‚Äôt be hypocrites

review: This app usually takes me a good 40 minutes to get an order to go through. The credit card processing will spin and spin and will have a pop up saying it won‚Äôt go through right now. Other times I will be in the middle of ordering and have multiple items added to my cart and the app will crash. review: This was my first time using Glovo  (9 Aug. 2022, in Marrakech).  The food arrived even ahead of schedule. The food was delicious and totally hot even though the restaurant was far. review: Glovo basically changed my lifestyle, getting groceries, food from my favorite restaurants that don't have delivery, once my playstation controller died while playing and 40 minutes i had a new one delivered to my door.. i would give 6 stars if i could.

review: Been using other app and there delivery is very expensive and on top of that it takes hours to get my food delivered , but Glovo u wowed me it came just in time at the exact time they estimated and it was value for money and less delivery fee

review:

review:
IMPORTANT: the option to tip a courrier must be added AFTER the order has been delivered, I‚Äôm not gonna tip someone who messed up my order before-hand ever again!!!

review:

I was then contacted requesting that I send a photo of my credit card and a photo of my passport. Really weird and no way I‚Äôm sending that information via unsecured email. 

Thankful none of the other services require sending photos of credit card and passport to use.

review: No way to disable notifications from advertisements. Only option is to disable notifications completely and then you miss order updates. Therefore they force you to receive spam or inconvenience the courier by not knowing being ready when the order is arriving (which lately takes 1+hr most of the time so it‚Äôs easy to completely forget).

review: Very poor rating functionality. All without exceptions restaurants have rating between 100 and 96%. Ordering in 96% positive reviewed restaurants I got pure garbage instead of the food. Google maps rating of this place was about 3 stars as I discovered later. So how this place could have 96% positive reviews from 500? I‚Äôve never saw restaurants below 96% positive. How is this faire? Looks like you promote people to buy and eat garbage. What there is no leave a review option????

Communication between restaurant and application broken. Impossible to recommend using.

review: Love this app, we use it all the time for our different needs. The customer service online and on the phone whenever there is an issue continues to be exceptional.

review: I live in Ukraine but am from the US originally. I downloaded the app, connected my card, and got my first (and only) delivery last week. I tried to order something today and was told that there had been some irregularities on my account and that I needed to contact customer support. It‚Äôs a shame that there is no customer support, just an endless loop of FAQs with no number or email to reach out to. I wouldn‚Äôt bother with this app at all unless you‚Äôre desperate.
title: Uninstalled after one delivery

review: My experience with Glovo has left me extremely disappointed. Not only did they substitute items in my order without seeking my consent, but they also charged my card twice mounting to 38‚Ç¨ and delivered to me only a few items which cost only 4‚Ç¨. They changed 38‚Ç¨ for an item worth 4‚Ç¨ from my card. Finally, they said according to the company policy, they can‚Äôt refund money back.
title: Glovo Overcharged and Substituted Items

review: Have used the App 7 times so far, and in 5 of those I have had some sort of problem with my orders. The last two have been the same, after 30 mins the order still appeared as ‚ÄúPreparing order‚Äù, and this time I tried contacting Customer Support and no answer from them. Do yourself a favor and install Uber Eats instead. Glovo, if I were Thanos, you would be the only thing that would be destroyed with the snap of my fingers.

review: Friendly and efficient service, the app works great, and is a huge improvement over the other delivery options in Lisbon. I use it for delivering meals when I'm too busy to cook, or have big bags of dog food delivered when it's too far and heavy to carry them on foot.

review: Easy to order. Wasn‚Äôt able to add my phone number manually, but the customer service agent was able to do it promptly. Very nice service and great variety of food spots nearby.

review: The  big problem of this application is that we can not pay online and always we should pay by cash.

review: Glovo is incompatible with US phone numbers. The app now is unable to take credit cards during order request but will take money from your account. I have 6 charges for attempted orders that ultimately leads me to believe the app is broken. This also leads me to conclude the 5 star app reviews are falsely generated and produced. Cash orders work no problem but nothing else. No reachable customer service to report concerns. Deleted the app.
title: Simply doesn‚Äôt work

review: Exercise extreme caution and avoid should you have dangerous food allergies. Over the course of several months the service has refused support for orders which were flawed to the extent of being inedible and in conflict with clearly articulated dietary restrictions. The online support staff are polite but bound by policy which robs customers and enriches a flawed business model. Paying for prime membership offers no beneficial treatment nor support. Avoid.
title: Support professionals are great / the policies are fraudulent

review: I tried to use the service, but onsecond order I experienced total disappointment. Ordered food from a restaurant just 1.8 km away from my address. Order did not appear. Technical support states that they cannot control the restaurants because they have they own delivery. I don't see the point of the intermediary (Glovo) if they can't provide the service. i deleted your app a horrible experience for me.

review: I have downloaded this multiple times and cannot place and order.  There is a glitch and no support :-/

Sometimes you wait 1 - 1.5 hours when they say it will be there between 30 and 40 minutes. I get that there are delays sometimes however when 3 or 4 out of 5 orders are very late, that‚Äôs not a special case, it is the norm. If they didn‚Äôt have 2 restaurants I like exclusively I would never use them again.

I requested they remove all my info per GDPR and have not heard back. Typical. Don‚Äôt use Glovo unless you want your info stolen.

I think Glovo is a very nice service concept but you need to give more coverage, Costa Rica is a very little country.

review:

Can you please clarify the specific steps that I should follow to file a complaint through your platform? Is there a specific form or process that I need to follow? How long does it typically take for a complaint to be resolved? Is there any way to escalate a complaint if I am not satisfied with the initial response?

review:
So, we tried Glovo for grocery delivery because we‚Äôre in lockdown and we were trying to avoid going out.

The first order went fine.

However, we had a problem with missing items from the second order. Contacted customer support and was ignored.

We decided to give it another try because we thought maybe it was a fluke.

Nope. More missing items and, so far, nothing from customer support.

In addition, we discovered that they double-billed is on the second order. Fortunately, it seems our bank caught that and blocked it but still...

To be fair to the delivery guys, all three were really friendly and quick.
title: Good luck when, not if, they mess up your order.

review:
I downloaded this app during my quarantine isolation period as it was necessary for me to get food somehow. It was a terrible 0/10 experience and I would‚Äôve preferred starving for two weeks than dealing with the in-app customer service. 

My first order was for a grocery store - they forgot to control for items and SIX out of twenty items were not delivered yet charged to my account. When I provided the receipts from the store, GLOVO credited me back the money surcharge. The annoying part was not the extra money I paid (obviously not great), but the fact that I had to make a new order with a new delivery fee just for the items that were essential to eat that night. 

But ok - this could have been an error with that individual grocery store as well - so I place about a week later my second order for a dinner from a restaurant ( using the credit for the false charges from the first order!). About an hour and a half waiting, I call the restaurant and they tell me GLOVO has not sent them any order - yet my credits were gone - so the money once again vanished and the restaurant closed at 10 pm so I could not place the order again - no food! Love lockdowns <3 

When I contacted customer service to at least get my MONEY back from the order that NEVER arrived - they only returned about half of the price of the order !?! And when I disputed, they said sorry for the mistake but once a refund has been processed it can‚Äôt be changed. So, I ended up paying for a service that I did not receive and giving money to an app that CLAIMS to deliver food - yet has failed to meet that simple goal twice in a row. I cant imagine ever being desperate enough to use this again when there are much better alternatives. I‚Äôm here typing my first ever review on the App Store simply because I‚Äôm hungry and bored and have no food to occupy myself with. 

(I‚Äôve seen five star reviews from people saying ‚Äúso much potential but they got my order wrong‚Äù - SO why did you give them five stars ?? Come on now)

review: Transaction on the card was marked as suspicious, as my bank informed me about 10mins since I placed the order. While the courier was on his way from the shop, I contacted the support to try and find a solution, while confirming with my bank that your company is not a fraudulent company (joke is on me now I guess). While I was on the chat, your support agent was screaming on the phone to the courier who arrived in the meantime at my parent‚Äôs house. Yup, screaming at the courier. Then screaming at my parent ‚ÄúWHO ORDERED THIS FOR YOU‚Äù. I am still online with the support, I guess they are not communicating in real time with each other, trying to change the type of payment, I am still hoping that there is a chance for my parents to get their groceries, groceries I am trying to pay for and stop all of the nonsence. But, no luck for us. Order cancelled. Courier got no money. We got the screaming. We got highly unprofessional behavior for what? For something that was not our fault. We tried to fix something that had nothing to do with us, and yet your company ended up charging my account (another suspicious activity) for the cancelled order. ü§Ø After all of that, another agent had the audacity to say that the order was canceled because my parents did not know the details of the order (?!). So we got the screaming, the lying, and the charge for the cancellation made by you without offering another way of payment. Excelent customer service and general common sense! (Glovo Serbia)

review:
I am writing to express my deep dissatisfaction with the service I recently experienced while using your platform. As a loyal customer who believed in your company's commitment to swift and reliable deliveries, I am appalled by the way my order was mishandled.

Your slogan, "Order anything you want with Glovo and it will be delivered in minutes," led me to trust that my order would be handled efficiently. However, my recent experience contradicted this promise entirely. We placed an order from restaurant in Serbia using the Glovo app, expecting a quick delivery as advertised. Unfortunately, my expectations were far from met.

After waiting for an excruciating 90 minutes without any updates, we reached out to your support team for clarification on the delay. Their response was that our order would be delivered as soon as possible, along with a promise of a refund for the inconvenience caused.

To my dismay, more than 160 minutes passed, and my order still hadn't arrived. I decided to contact your support team again, sharing the details of my prolonged wait.

The situation took a final disappointing turn when we received a call around 11pm, much too late, informing me that restaurant was now closed, and my order could not be fulfilled. This outcome is not only frustrating but also reflects a complete disregard for the promises made by your company. I was left without the food I ordered, and nothing that was initially promised to me was honored.

I believe in giving companies the chance to rectify their mistakes, which is why I am sharing my experience with you in hopes that you will take immediate steps to address these issues. It's essential for Glovo to uphold its commitments to customers and ensure that such incidents do not recur.

I trust that you will take this complaint seriously and make the necessary improvements to your service to regain the trust of your customers.

I look forward to hearing from you promptly and to seeing actions that reflect a commitment to your customers' satisfaction.
title: Glovo Serbia - Belgrade

review:
The way this company handles itself is disrespectful and quite possibly illegal. Due to their lack of response I will be pursuing legal action. 

After placing my initial order, the app informed me I had to email my credit card (partial) and ID (full), which I did and then managed to place my first order. I was charged for it, and it was delivered and I accepted it. All good. Or so I thought...

Upon trying to place a second order, without any other use of the platform, I received an email stating my account was blocked due to a violation of terms of service, and that the decision was final. What violation? What are you accusing me (erroneously) of? I only used the app once and can't possibly think of how one would violate terms of service on this app...

So I wrote for help on the app and received the same canned response. I replied on the email asking politely to be inform of how I violated any terms, explaining I was sure it was a mistake. Same canned response. Account blocked. Decision is final.

OK. So what if my claim had been for false charges or something else? They deny it...the decision is final...there is NO human contact email or phone to redress....this doesn't seem legal. It sure isn't fair competition for other delivery retailers who can't hide behind the internet.

I wrote to them on Facebook, asking politely for the contact of their legal department. Upon asking why I wanted it, and hearing my case...they promised to further look into it. One week later I contact them again on Facebook and they ask again for my email registered with the app....guess what? They now say I don't have an account. Nevermind that I have emails, bank records, and everything proving I ordered from said email account...and they still avoid giving me the contact details for their legal department.

Be very wary of doing business with this app. You can not claim any wrongdoing on their part...and you can't appeal.

I will be seeking help from the authorities. No one is above the law.
title: BEWARE total lack of responsibility

review: I waited two hours for an order, unable to get in touch with the courier. I called the restaurant, who told me that my food had been ready for well over an hour and that they were going to close. When I called the Glovo support number, while they were very friendly, they told me that they couldn't fill the order because the courier had apparently turned off his phone and just given up. I raced to the restaurant at midnight to pick up the food because I'm a regular there and was incredibly embarrassed by the trouble caused to them. What sort of a delivery app gives you no estimate of when the delivery will arrive, and doesn't offer contact options in-app other than calling the delivery guy? The only other option is sending an email. First time and last time I'm trying this.

review:
Kuriri uvek kasne sa dostavom i ƒçesto se ne javljaju na telefon. Nema opcije ocenjivanja kurira, a nema opcije da se ocenjuju ni restorani sto je totalna glupost jer neki vam ≈°alju buckurise koje ni svinjama ne bih dao. Nema≈° opciju da pozoves kontakt centar i da tra≈æi≈° pare nazad ili da se ≈æalis na uslugu i da ti po≈°alju drugu porud≈æbinu. Ispod su dva primera:

1. Sinoc naruƒçio picu dobio picu koju nisam naruƒçio jer ne jedem te sastojke i bacio sam je sve je ko≈°talo oko 1400 dinara nema≈° kome da se zalis  
2. Malo pre mi stigla porud≈æbina iz Meka jer ne ≈æelim da eksperimentisem sa drugim restoranima pouƒçen od sinoc ali je porud≈æbina bila sva mokra od Kole tako da je pomfrit i sendviƒç skroz natopljeni kolom i sve sam bacio  vrednost Porudzbine je 1100 DIN i opet kome se zaliti za lo≈°u uslugu

Ono kako ƒáu se sada ja ophoditi prema kuririma i samom glovu je sledeƒáe:
1. Sve sto se naruƒçi neƒáu plaƒáati karticom veƒá kesom na licu mesta uz fiskalni raƒçun i za dostavu
2. U sluƒçaju ako kasne neƒáu prihvatati porud≈æbinu 
3. U isto vreme ƒáu naruƒçiti i preko Wolt aplikacije pa ako stignu u isto vreme primicu Wolt porud≈æbinu, a Glovo porud≈æbinu odbiti
4. Sa kuririma biti maksimalno neljubazan

Svima koji ƒçitaju savetujem da se isto ovako pona≈°aju ako neƒáete da vas za va≈°e pare neko pravi ludima.

Slepci jedni kupili su Donesi mogli su da preuzmu i naƒçin poslovanja kakav je normalan.

Neko iz Glovo ako ƒçita ovo pa zar vam nije u interesu da imate armiju zadovoljnih ljudi uslugom i da imate ulistane samo restorane koji ispunjavaju va≈°e standarde. Za≈°to nema mogucnosti da se da negativna ocena restoranu ako je zaslu≈æio i da negativna ocena kuriru pa da me ne slu≈æi vi≈°e kao sto imate mogucnosti da tra≈æite drugog konobara u restoranu. Po razmislite malo bolje o va≈°oj usluzi jer vi ni≈°ta neproizvodite osim besa ako je usluga lo≈°a.

Sto se mene tiƒçe dugo sam posle donesi oklevao sa vasom aplikacijom i pokajao sam se sto sam je instalirao. Od sada koristim Wolt za koji smatram da je isto sranje kao vi smrdljivi Glovo koji ƒáu koristiti kada budem hteo da se poigram i nasalim sa svima vama koji ste u tom lancu na naƒçin kako je opisano iznad.

title: P√©sima aplicaci√≥n

review:
Para empezar el app tiene problemas graves que no entiendo como no los han arreglado , y sin problemas que cualquier QA podr√≠a detectar . 

1. No se puede editar las direcciones que agregaste , lo que nos lleva a problema 2 .

2 . Agregar mi ubicaci√≥n actual ( mi casa ) parece f√°cil pero una vez que decid√≠ la ubicaci√≥n me pide m√°s informaci√≥n como se√±as . Hasta ah√≠ todo bien , confirmas y luego te muestra una pantalla donde no podes ver donde quedo el marcador realmente porque est√° cortada. Y la sorpresa es que cuando ya hiciste el pedido y ves que viene el repartidor la ubicaci√≥n no est√° donde t√∫ la pusiste . Por eso ves que muchos reviews dicen que el conductor siempre llegar al lugar equivocado . Y volvemos al punto 1 , no puedo cambiar nada de esa direcci√≥n o eliminarla , solo agregar nuevas que tendr√°n el mismo problema .

3 . Al agregar una nueva direcci√≥n si ya ten√≠as el pedido listo , se reinicia y te borra todo lo agregado al carrito . Requiriendo otra vez agregar todo . Lo que nos lleva al problema de pedir un mandado donde nos pide direcci√≥n de donde vendr√≠a y hacia donde ir√≠a . Al escoger esto obviamente se reinicia todo y pr√°cticamente no sirve . 

4 . Si hiciste el pedido , siempre pasar√° que te dice un tiempo estimado del repartidor que aveces sigue bajando pero el no se mueve . Y de repente se mueve y est√° fuera de tu casa . Lo que me obliga a no confiar en el app sino estar vigilando desde que compre por miedo que llegue y no me diera cuenta . Muy diferente a Uber . 

Casi que los puntos del 1 al 3 van relacionados con la direcci√≥n y el problema de reiniciar el app agregar uno nuevo . Cosas que deber√≠a estar solucionado porque me parece cr√≠tico para el app. En fin esperemos que lo arreglen pero ahorita esta p√©sima el app .

review:
Non fanno consegne tra comuni diversi, o comunque superiori ai 25km. O almeno questo √® quello che ho dedotto, data la totale mancanza di informazioni su come funzionano le consegne. 
Avevo dimenticato gli occhiali da vista a casa di mio padre a Monza e speravo di recuperarli tramite corriere Glovo con consegna a Milano, visto che non ho la macchina e in tempi di Covid non volevo prendere il treno. Niente, nonostante la vicinanza tra i due comuni, e la copertura di entrambe le zone (almeno secondo la mappa sul loro sito) non mi √® stato possibile effettuare l‚Äôordine. Che andrebbe anche bene, se almeno mettessero una qualche spiegazione del perch√© (es. ‚Äúsuperata la distanza massima‚Äù ecc.). Ho cercato tra le faq e non c‚Äô√® nessuna spiegazione, nemmeno una ricerca Google ha chiarito come funzionano le consegne con corriere. Alla fine ho demorso, quindi non ho mai testato il servizio. Tuttavia la semplice mancanza di informazioni chiare e precise su come funziona il servizio, le aree di consegna ecc, mi fa dubitare della seriet√† dell‚Äôazienda.
title: Mancanza di informazioni chiare e ‚Äúoverpromise‚Äù

review: ESTA APP TIENE LA PEOR INTERFACE DE TODAS LA APP DE PEDIDOS, INDISCUTIBLEMENTE ES LA PEOR, NI EN TIEMPOS COMO ESTOS ENFRENTANDO UNA PANDEMIA PUEDEN DAR UN SERVICIO EFICIENTE O POR LO MENOS TRANSPARENTE YA QUE LUEGO DE ESPERAR 30 MINUTOS MI PEDIDO AUN NO HABIA REFLEJADO PROGRESO EN LA APP LO QUE ME HACE COMUNICARME CON SOPORTE DONDE ME DICEN QUE YA ME HAN ASIGNADO REPARTIDOR PUES MI PEDIDO NO TENIA, 30 MINUTOS LUEGO (1 HORA LUEGO DE HACER EL PEDIDO) ME VUELVO A COMUNICAR CON SOPORTE Y ME DICEN QUE ESTA EN PROCESO Y ME CAMBIAN EL REPARTIDOR PARA QUE LLEGUE MAS RAPIDO MI PEDIDO QUE HICE A LAS 1:50P, LES INFORMO QUE EL ESTABLECIMIENTO CIERRA A LAS 3:30 Y ME DICEN QUE EL REPARTIDOR YA VIENE DE CAMINO (ERA MENTIRA). EN CONCLUSION MI PEDIDO JAMAS LLEGO Y ME QUEDE ESPERANDO LA COMIDA DE MI FAMILIA QUE NUNCA LLEGO POR EL PESIMO SERVICIO E INTERFACE DE ESTA PESIMA APLICACION, NO LA RECOMIENDO PARA NADA ME ARREPIENTO DE HABER INTENTADO UTILIZARLA, TIENEN MUCHO QUE MEJORAR. 1 ESTRELLA PORQUE NO PUEDO DAR 0.

review: I recently joined the app per my friend‚Äôs recommendation. She sent me a coupon code to use when ordering. I signed up and tried to order food the EXACT SAME DAY and the coupon code didn‚Äôt work. I figured ‚Äúhey, no worries. i will try to use it next time‚Äù. The next time came around and it didn‚Äôt work. Apparently, you have to use it the first time, which wasn‚Äôt clearly stated. Even still, I decided to contact the customer service team. They said they couldn‚Äôt help me because I had an account that had already been registered. I told them that‚Äôs impossible because I just made an account on the day of my first order. I even had screenshots showing that I downloaded the app on the same day. I realized that it may have been a problem with my number because the app wouldn‚Äôt let me sign up with my US number, so i use my friends spanish number for the deliveries. They didn‚Äôt care. The help person continued to send me the same automated messages for over an hour saying that I already had an account and that they could not refund me or give me another coupon code. They were also very rude and not at all understanding. I felt incredibly disrespected and annoyed that I wasted my money. I would not recommend shipping with them. Also, another time I ordered from them and they said my food would come in 35-45 minutes. It took over an hour and a half, which is more than double the original time. They gave me all of 9 cents USD to compensate me. My order was about $22.50. What am I going to do with 9 cents?!! Like I said, don‚Äôt waste your time, money, or energy dealing with this company. If I had the option, I would give them 0 stars.
title: Bad Customer Service

review:
I would like to start by saying that this app is not only a food delivery app, but also a spiritual guide book that if you are smart enough to read it you can evolve as a person. Via this app you learn patience, how to deal with your anger (if you never had anger management issues after using Glovo I‚Äôm sure you will),  courage and self defense skills when one of the delivery guys decides to stalk you all of the sudden and you learn how to enjoy cold food in winter time. 

Also, this app teaches you ‚Äúmagic math‚Äù.  You order food for 27.30 lei and you end up paying 52 lei. But every extra fee is totally worth it. For example, Glovo are the only people that understood that I love my food soaked in soda. 

Long story short, if you‚Äôre life is boring use this app to order your food, I promise you every order will also bring lots of new feelings and thrill. 

XOXO, Glovo fan! ‚ù§Ô∏è

review:
You know I thought this was a good initiative till I placed my first order. My colleague at work was celebrating his birthday and I  wanted to surprise him so I ordered pizza from Cheezy pizza and i paid through Mobile money. I was charged and deducted only to wait for an hour to see that my order has been cancelled. Without any communication. So i placed another order thinking Glovo would use the initial money they deducted and they asked me to pay additional money for the new order. So I tried to cancel but there was no option to cancel the order. I chat with their customer support only for them to tell me they will charge me product and driver fees when i go ahead with the cancellation. That aside, I ask for a refund for the initial order i placed and they told me to wait 24-72 hours!! Like is this even for real? What kind of service are you offering to your customers Glovo? So I should wait 24-72 hours to get money we I was charged so I could surprise someone on his birthday? And what‚Äôs pissing me off the most is the standoffish attitude these so called customer support agents show. This is the worst experience anyone could ever experience. 
I have deleted this app and will tell everyone I know to do same. SHAME!!!!!!

review:
Hello!
My name is Svitlana Sapsai, I am the brand manager of the cafe "City-Zen caf√©&bar" in Kiev, Ukraine.
Today, in one of our cafes at 3, Victory Avenue an order was made through your delivery service. Your courier came to the cafe and showed an order on a mobile phone: 3 servings of spring rolls with salmon and three nut sauces for a total of 387.03 UAH. The order was issued at 17:00. After some time, a woman called the cafe to whom you delivered the order. She was very dissatisfied and pretended that she received not what she ordered. And also demanded to send her the correct order. The woman assured the manager that she ordered one croissant with salmon, one veggie spring roll, one spring roll with salmon and two nutty sauces. She also stated that no one had warned her about the delivery of UAH 60, and we should return the money for delivery to her. In order to quickly resolve the conflict, the manager of this cafe decided to replace her order with the correct one. The correct order was sent by taxi directly to this woman. We also reimbursed her the cost of delivery 60 UAH. Wrong order issued by you, this woman returned back on the same taxi. And put there a napkin with the words "Thank you for the terrible service!".
This whole situation would not have happened if you:
1) notified us that you intend to place the menu of our restaurant in your application and would ask permission to do so;
2) would be able to receive feedback from the consumers.
This woman could not understand that you are an intermediary, and that a mistake in the order was solely your fault. In the end, the woman was not satisfied with the service of the cafe, and not the work of your application.
The cafe managers, as well as the top management, were not aware of the fact that the menu of our cafe was placed in your application and could not transfer responsibility to you.
Because of such situations, our reputation suffers and we incur material costs for your mistakes. At the moment we cooperate exclusively with the food delivery service "Eda.ua‚Äù
We ask you to remove the menu of our cafe from your application and reimburse us for material expenses in the amount of 557 UAH.
title: Ukraine

review: Al realizar un pedido al mcdonalds, que se encuentra situado a 20 minutos caminando desde mi ubicacion, este tardo mas de una hora, pudiendo visualizar que el mensajero se encontro parado 20 minutos despues de haber recogido el pedido, luego se reasigna de mensajero el pedido justo cuando lo llamo , al llegar el pedido , llega otra persona diferente al que aparecia en la aplicacion, asi entregandome una bolsa semi abierta, y despidiendose con agilidad, cuando abro la bolsa encuentro servilletas sucias y faltante de varios de los articulos pedidos, al llamar a servicio al cliente y explicar mi situacion , al asesor le hace gracia mi caso y se rie, asi solo diciendome que me puede reenbolsar unicamente lo que faltaba , que es esto? Te obligan a compartir el glovo con el mensajero , pasa algo asi y les hace gracia... es un pesimo servicio , donde los mensajeros pueden hacer lo que quieran y no hay consecuencias , y ante las soluciones que te brindan deberia darles verguenza!
title: Pesimo servicio al cliente
